forager.creator

Class DungeonCreator

  • java.lang.Object
    • forager.creator.DungeonCreator

  • public class DungeonCreator
extends java.lang.Object

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      DungeonCreator(int xwidth, int ywidth, int startingEnergy)
      Defines the size of the dungeon and the starting energy with which the dungeon is solvable.

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      char[][] createDungeon(boolean easy, int seed)
      Creates a random, solvable dungeon.
      void digBestPath()
      Produces a straight path through the dungeon with enough energy on the route to pass through.
      void digWindingPath()
      Produces a path through the dungeon that has enough energy, but requires backtracking.
      void placeRandomEnergy(int percentage, int offset)
      Places energy at random positions in the dungeon.
      void removeVerticalEnergyTiles(int x, int y, int range)
      Removes energy tiles at a vertical axis from a given location.

    • Constructor Detail

      • DungeonCreator

        public DungeonCreator(int xwidth,
                      int ywidth,
                      int startingEnergy)
        Defines the size of the dungeon and the starting energy with which the dungeon is solvable.
        Parameters:
        xwidth - width of the dungeon
        ywidth - height of the dungeon
        startingEnergy - amount of energy at the start of the dungeon

    • Method Detail

      • createDungeon

        public char[][] createDungeon(boolean easy,
                              int seed)
        Creates a random, solvable dungeon.
        Parameters:
        easy - Determines whether an easy or difficult dungeon is created.
        seed - Random seed for the random dungeon.
        Returns:
        2d char array containing the dungeon.

      • placeRandomEnergy

        public void placeRandomEnergy(int percentage,
                              int offset)
        Places energy at random positions in the dungeon.
        Parameters:
        percentage - percentage chance of a tile being energy
        offset - distance from the edge where no energy is placed.

      • digBestPath

        public void digBestPath()
        Produces a straight path through the dungeon with enough energy on the route to pass through.

      • digWindingPath

        public void digWindingPath()
        Produces a path through the dungeon that has enough energy, but requires backtracking.

      • removeVerticalEnergyTiles

        public void removeVerticalEnergyTiles(int x,
                                      int y,
                                      int range)
        Removes energy tiles at a vertical axis from a given location.
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate
        y - y-coordinate
        range - distance within which energy tiles are removed
